name: INVoiceShortcutCenter
desc: Retrieve the user's shortcuts and make shortcut suggestions.

items.name: func getAllVoiceShortcuts(completion: ([INVoiceShortcut]?, Error?) -> Void)
items.desc: Retrieves all shortcuts added to Siri for your app.

items.name: func getVoiceShortcut(with: UUID, completion: (INVoiceShortcut?, Error?) -> Void)
items.desc: Retrieves a shortcut the user added to Siri.

items.name: func setShortcutSuggestions([INShortcut])
items.desc: Suggests shortcuts the user may want to add to Siri.

items.name: class INShortcutReference
items.desc: An object representing an action available in your app that the system may suggest to a user or a user may add to Siri.
